entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
